comment.author: 32162360@N00
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/anmm_thecommons] Is there a postmark or date on the other side of your postcard?   It might help date the PhM photo.  I think it is c.1905-10 from the "jaunty" typeface bottom right.
